structure.unit: Officers And Employees Of Cities, Towns And Districts

law.catch_line: Policemen Assigned To Photographic Or Fingerprint Identification Work; Additional Compensation
law.text: In any city or town which accepts the provisions of this section, a member of the police department assigned to photographic or fingerprint identification work in said department shall, after completion of one yearâ€™s service in such assignment, receive in addition to his annual salary as a police officer a salary increase of six hundred dollars a year, to be paid him so long as he is assigned to said photographic or fingerprint identification work.
